short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly redirect you to video, no ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NEW UPDATE, WORKS AS OF 04 Mar 09

* Regarding the latest update which ask for more permission. Actually, there is no new permissions, the update just added a huge list of openload domain which expect to work for a long period of time.

Subtitle is available (temporary not working for inline video)!

- 1.4.0 domains update
- 1.3.0 update new domain + subtitle!
- 1.2.2 update new domain
- 1.2.0 Sweet potato
- 1.1.8 update new domain
- 1.1.6 remove unnecessary permission
- 1.1.5 Reduce 40% size of extension, extremely lightweight
- 1.1.4 Fixes for 2018

Instantly redirect to direct video link when you access an openload link, so no more annoying advertisement. And the link is downloadable.

Also work if openload is embedded in a frame.

Extremely lightweight, only run on openload domains/frame. So please help to report new openload domain, I will update extension asap!

After the installation you may want to hide the extension icon.

Please report the error If any.
--
Skip Openload Ads, Remove Openload Ads, Bypass openload Ads, no Openload Popup Ads.

* This extension use Google Analytics to help to collect anonymous information to serve you better. We do not share any information to 3rd parties. Once you install the extension, you agree with above. 
Thank you!

* Below is my google translation for top languages of user of this extension, to show my little appreciation. So sorry if the translation is not correct, much appreciate if you could give me the correct version of them in the feedback.

------ (KOR)
직접로드 링크에 액세스 할 때 즉시 비디오 링크로 리디렉션하므로 성가신 광고가 없습니다. 링크는 다운로드 할 수 있습니다. 이걸 시험해 줘서 고마워!!

------ (ES-ES)
Redirija al instante al enlace directo de video cuando accede a un enlace de descarga abierta, de modo que no haya más publicidad molesta. Y el enlace se puede descargar. Muchas gracias por probar esto!!

------ (TW)
當您訪問openload鏈接時，立即重定向到直接視頻鏈接，因此不再煩人的廣告。 該鏈接可下載。 非常感謝您嘗試這一點!!
